title: Project-Based Elective Course Design for Strengthening Pediatric Pharmacy Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmacology and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A customized educational program aimed at healthcare professionals to systematically understand and apply core pediatric pharmacy topics in practice

learning_goals: Assess the ability to calculate pharmacokinetics and adjust dosages according to pediatric patient characteristics.
Develop and apply PBL-based therapeutic intervention protocols for pediatric diseases.
Analyze FDA pediatric drug development guidelines and write an evaluation report on ethical issues.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
